Note: Lubricant is required for the O-rings on the nozzle holder. Before use, apply lubricant to the end of the nozzle holder and insert into every nozzle tip until the lubricant has coated the inside of the tip and the resistance decreases. Do NOT use white lithium grease for this; it can damage the O-rings.
